Title: In the Dragon's Lair
Writer: Robia Rashid (created by), Robia Rashid, D.J. Ryan (staff writer), Bob Smiley (consulting producer)
Actors: Mina Badie, Jeremiah Birkett, Jenna Boyd, Sanjay Chandani
Plot: To prepare for college life, Sam sleeps over at Zahid's. Sam's $700 loss reunites Doug and Elsa with Arlo's parents, former friends of theirs.
